metadata.title: CVE-2023-42298 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in GPAC GPAC v.2.2.1 and before allows a local attacker to cause adenial of service via the Q_DecCoordOnUnitSphere function of filesrc/bifs/unquantize.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
